sentences.en: Evidence was piling up against them.
sentences.cn: 不利于他们的证据越来越多.

sentences.en: He was piling clothes into the suitcase.
sentences.cn: 他在把衣服一件件叠放进手提箱中。

sentences.en: Her debts are piling up and she has no money to pay them.
sentences.cn: 她债台日高已无力偿还.

sentences.en: I've got reports that have been piling up for weeks, and who's going to type them?
sentences.cn: 我的一些报告已经堆了好几个星期, 谁来替我打那些报告?

sentences.en: Mail was still piling up at the office.
sentences.cn: 办公室里的邮件仍在往上堆。

sentences.en: Outside the windows snow fell like balls of cotton wool, piling over the green - glazed roof - files.
sentences.cn: 窗外的雪不住的在下,扯棉搓絮一般, 绿瓦上匀整的堆砌上几道雪沟.

sentences.en: Overhead, grayish - white clouds covered the sky, piling up heavily like decaying corpses.
sentences.cn: 天上罩满了灰白的薄云, 同腐烂的尸体似的沉沉的盖在那里.

sentences.en: Problems were piling up at work.
sentences.cn: 工作中的问题越积越多。

sentences.en: She's always piling on how artistic she is!
sentences.cn: 她老是夸耀她自己艺术感有多强!

sentences.en: She's been piling up money ever since she got the job.
sentences.cn: 自从得了那份工作以来,她一直在攒钱.

sentences.en: The applications are piling up now for that school.
sentences.cn: 要求进这个学校的申请书现在已经堆积如山了.

sentences.en: The halves of the uppers came piling steadily down.
sentences.cn: 鞋帮不断地传到嘉莉那里,越积越多.

trans.tran_en: Pilings are wooden, concrete, or metal posts that are pushed into the ground and on which buildings or bridges are built. Pilings are often used in very wet areas so that the buildings do not flood.

trans.tran_cn: 堆起( pile的现在分词 )，堆叠，放置，装入
